name: cifti-label-to-border
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
DRAW BORDERS AROUND CIFTI LABELS.

For each surface, takes the labels on the matching structure and draws borders around the labels.  Use -column to only draw borders around one label map.

inputs.name: opt_placement_fraction
inputs.description: set how far along the edge border points are drawn: fraction along edge from inside vertex (default 0.33)

inputs.name: opt_column_column
inputs.description: select a single column: the column number or name
